episodes.original_body:
Case: Jimmy-Ferguson-MVA-5-30-2024
Client: Jimmy Ferguson

Completed comprehensive case file organization using 8-bucket system. Phase 1: Generated file inventory (99 total files, 47 scrambled .md files). Phase 2: Analyzed files across 3 parallel sub-agents, created reorganization map with 143 rows. Phase 3: Quality review showed 4.26% error rate (2 date errors corrected). Phase 4: Executed reorganization - moved 139 files into proper buckets with standardized naming (YYYY-MM-DD format). Phase 5: Verification confirmed all 8 buckets created, files properly organized by provider/type. Insurance organized by PIP (Kentucky Farm Bureau - 20 files) and BI (KACo/Charles Taylor - 9 files). Lien files organized by entity (WellCare, Rawlings Company).
